author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
5/ If you can, give a day off! 🏝️

Sometimes, the best way to show you're grateful for someone's hard work is by rewarding them with some well-earned R&R. 

Plus, burnout is a real thing! Show you care with a little time off to rest and refresh.

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
6/ Send a gift 🎁

Whether it's a bottle of wine or a basket of goodies, sending a gift is a classic way to show someone you care! 

It doesn't have to be expensive to make an impact. It's always the thought that counts!

Now, get out there & show some gratitude!

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
4/ Offer personal development opportunities 🌱

What better way to show your colleague you care than to offer a chance to grow in their career?

A workshop or a project that could lead to a promotion is a great way to show your gratitude & your investment in their career path.

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
3/ Take your team to lunch 🥗 

If you work in-person with your colleagues, treat them to a lunch to show your appreciation for their hard work.

Or, send them a gift card for lunch or coffee if you're remote! 

It's amazing what a small gesture like this can do for morale.

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
2/ Give someone a shoutout in a public channel 📢

Kudos mean a lot in a 1-on-1, but can be even more impactful when expressed in the eyes of other peers. 

Give a colleague a quick thanks in a public communication channel at work to make their day!

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
1/ Write handwritten notes to colleagues ✏️

In this digital age, taking the time to physically write a card can go a long way.

Find the time to surprise a colleague you truly admire with a handwritten note!
